column1: Another abnormality bites the dust I lol'ed at that.
If you just accept two voice actors should never have been cast in their role without more triaing
column2: then the only issue is how short the episodes and series is. The concept

column1: Another display of superhuman abilities on Kyoko's part )and she doesn't seem to notice?). A revelation of the super-secret past of her otherwise pleasant boss. Another interesting episode slightly marred by less than excellent voice overs.
